pr_title: Update readme to align with .net and python and fixed a customer's readme feedbacks

timeline.message: update readme to align with .net and python
remove ref links to python repo and revisited authentication section readme

timeline.author: srnagar

replies.bodyText:
I saw this ref page using DefaultAzureCredential. https://github.com/Azure/azure-sdk-for-java/wiki/Identity-and-Authentication
Should I follow it or use TokenCredential?
replies.author: mssfang

replies.bodyText: It's better to use TokenCredential rather than a specific implementation. The builder says that credential() requires TokenCredential.
replies.author: srnagar

timeline.message: Use Text Analytics client instead of TextAnalyticsClient since we have sync and async
remove ToC and used a correct link
update this link in aka but not update the link directly here
